SEARCH
Package io.github.vega.math

Class Quaternion

java.lang.Object
io.github.vega.math.Quaternion
public class Quaternion extends Object
Quaternion model. These are a start on some very simple quaternion routines. Quaternions are often used as a non-singular method for representing rotations or attitudes. There are a lot more methods required to use quaternions in the propagation of the rotational state of an object. However, these will provide the basic methods for going to and from a more traditional transformation matrix representation.
Author:
Andrew Spencer, David Hammen, Edwin Z. Crues (edwin.z.crues@nasa.gov)
